ValidationRule.description: Opportunity Name is Required for Product Specification Record to move the Status from Define to Design
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ), 'Define'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Design'), ISBLANK( Opportunity_Name__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Opportunity Name” is required to update the Status
